description: Joyal Beauty Super Brightening Vitamin C Serum is a powerful concentrated delivery system for the highest form of active, stabilized,  Vitamin C boosting collagen production and increasing elasticity and firmness for your beautiful skin.  It is enriched with  vitamin E, ferulic acid, pure vegan hyaluronic acid and many anti-aging formulas to plump skin cells and restore cells.   Our potent plants-derived ferulic acid incorporation into the topical solution of vitamin C+E improved chemical stability of the vitamins C+E and doubled photoprotection to solar-simulated irradiation of skin from 4-fold to approximately 8-fold as measured by both erythema and sunburn cell formation. This combination of pure natural small molecular antioxidant can reach deep skin layer and provide meaningful synergistic protection against oxidative stress in skin. You will definitely see amazing radiant glow with your complexion within 4 weeks!Functions★ Provide amazing eight-fold small molecular weight antioxidant protection.★ Proven to reduce and restore sunburn cells up to 96%.★ Prevention of the formation of free radicals in sun exposed skin.★ Fade sun spots and discoloration right away.★ Refine skin texture and reduce wrinkle formation.★ Plump skin cells and increase elasticity.★ Provide deep moisture protection on the skin.★ Prevent and treat UV-induced damage.★ Brighten and restore the skin cells to its natural radiant glory.★ Manufacturer's Guarantee: Our goal is 100% Customer Satisfaction! We provide 30 Days Money Back Warranty! If you are not satisfied with your order, we will happily refund your money. Risk-Free Return. Look good; Feel great! Order Now!
title: Best Vitamin C Serum for Face & Skin -Super Brightening Vitamin C 20% Serum by Joyal Beauty. Best Skin Tightener + Best Skin Lightening Product for Your Best Skin Ever!
